title: Aurelian Sol vs Yasuo
body:
Hey,

So the new champion is coming out and I was curious, how does braum unbreakable and yasuo wind wall interact with Aurelian Sol's passive and q?  It seems logical that his q wouldn't be blocked as it seems like vilktors chaos storm the way it moves, but what about his passive?  If you could windwall his passve that would gimp him of significant damage for the duration that he is missing one.

Can anyone go on the pbe and figure out what is going on with this, as I can see him as being a yasuo counterpick or get counterpicked by yasuo depending on this interaction.

replies.body: at this point most have found the answer to this but Aurelian Sol's Passive is uneffected by both yasuo's wind wall and Braums shield,  it can't be cancelled by either one, just passes right through. his Q stun, however, CAN be canceled out

i tested it out in my recent game where I was playing yasuo and I had a braum in my team. apparently aurelion sol's passive has no interation with the walls, but his q is obliviated when it touches the wall, any part.

> [{quoted}](name=Omega360,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ELWjA664,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-03-09T17:06:21.660+0000)
>
> Hey,
> 
> So the new champion is coming out and I was curious, how does braum unbreakable and yasuo wind wall interact with Aurelian Sol's passive and q?  It seems logical that his q wouldn't be blocked as it seems like vilktors chaos storm the way it moves, but what about his passive?  If you could windwall his passve that would gimp him of significant damage for the duration that he is missing one.
> 
> Can anyone go on the pbe and figure out what is going on with this, as I can see him as being a yasuo counterpick or get counterpicked by yasuo depending on this interaction.

I have an pbe account but i has no friends on pbe  to test this out on pbe.

> [{quoted}](name=OurLestrade,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ELWjA664,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-09T17:26:45.624+0000)
>
> Could try the Yasuo bot :P

incredibly unreliable those bots are garbage. I could stand still and morgana would sometimes miss her Q.

Aurelion Sol's Q is straight up a skillshot. It's a projectile, so it'll get stopped by both Windwall and Unbreakable. The only thing I don't know is whether the projectile is destroyed as soon as the edge touches or if the core needs to collide with the walls, since that's determined by where the hitbox is.

Sadly, I don't know how the passive interacts with the walls. Those orbs might be coded like minions, since they kind of don't have a mechanic to spawn; they're just sort of constant. I'll try to test it when I get home, but that'll be a few hours from now.
